select
from baofeishenqing where baofeiren = #{baofeiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from baofeishenqing where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baofeiyuanyin like concat('%',#{baofeiyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baofeishuliang >= concat('',#{baofeishuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and baofeishuliang <= concat('',#{baofeishuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and baofeiren like concat('%',#{baofeiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from baofeishenqing where 1=1
and baofeiren =#{baofeiren}

select from baofeishenqing where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baofeiyuanyin like concat('%',#{baofeiyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and baofeishuliang >= concat('',#{baofeishuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and baofeishuliang <= concat('',#{baofeishuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and baofeiren like concat('%',#{baofeiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

bianhao, shebeimingcheng, baofeiyuanyin, baofeishuliang, baofeiren,
